localize.title: Buzzing on Product Hunt
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Product Hunt in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Union54 is a debit card issuing API for Africa. It allows any software company to provide debit cards to their customers without needing a bank partner or a "credit card processor". Marqeta for Africa.
nodes.title: Union54 - Debit card issuing API for Africa
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Consolidate corporate cards, expense management, bill payments, accounting, and reporting into one simple and free solution designed to save time and money. Businesses that use Ramp save an average of 3.3% and close their books 86% faster.
nodes.title: Ramp 2.0 - The finance automation platform that saves you time & money
nodes.author: Nick Abouzeid

nodes.excerpt: Monto provides employees of our affiliated companies 24/7 access to their earned wages on-demand for a low fixed fee. Users decide when to get paid, obtaining the flexibility they need to achieve financial wellness and avoiding thousands in costs and fees.
nodes.title: Monto - The platform that revolutionizes the way employees get paid.
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

nodes.excerpt: Build a reliable, monthly income with Ko-fi Memberships! Let your most important fans support you at different tiers and unlock unique benefits like Discord roles, exclusive content or physical rewards.
nodes.title: Ko-fi Memberships - Earn a regular, monthly income directly from your fans
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Meet Sequin, a new type of debit card that builds womenâ€™s credit. Women are twice as likely to report a negative experience with credit - Sequin is changing that. Use Sequin like a debit card, and weâ€™ll build your credit with every swipe! No credit check.
nodes.title: Sequin - A bright coral debit card that builds womenâ€™s credit! ğŸ’ªğŸ½
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Abacus, Puzzl's Gross-to-Net Calculation API, lets developers access compliant payroll calculations for all 50 states and territories in the United States via a simple API.
nodes.title: Abacus - Accurate payroll calculations, every time
nodes.author: Gustaf AlstrÃ¶mer

nodes.excerpt: PAYZE makes it easy for internet businesses in former Soviet Union countries to integrate payments with easy APIâ€™s on their website or mobile apps and receive card payments from all around the world through single integration, enabling instant scale up.
nodes.title: PAYZE - Stripe for former soviet union countries
nodes.author: Gustaf AlstrÃ¶mer

nodes.excerpt: Dots is the simplest way to send and accept payments online, especially if youâ€™re a marketplace or hiring 1099 workers. Our API accepts payments from your favorite credit card processor, PayPal, and more. It also enables payouts using Venmo, ACH, Zelle, etc.
nodes.title: Dots - Cash for the internet
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Nomod makes it beautifully easy to process card payments on your phone, with no hardware card terminals or mobile card readers required! Download the Nomod app on Android or iOS and start accepting card payments via NFC, camera, or keyboard, in a few minutes
nodes.title: Nomod - Accept card payments on your phone, anytime, anywhere
nodes.author: Julie Chabin

nodes.excerpt: Inai is the only payment integration companies need to accept online payments globally. We provide a universal API that connects with multiple payment rails, fraud, tax and BI tools, and can be setup in minutes.
nodes.title: inai - Global payments without code
nodes.author: Gustaf AlstrÃ¶mer

nodes.excerpt: Cartfuel gives you the tools you need to accept one-time and recurring payments with Hubspot. All sales data automatically goes into HubSpot. Meaning you can trigger workflows to follow up with customers. No custom code or complex systems needed.
nodes.title: Cartfuel - Accept payments In HubSpot
nodes.author: Justin Mitchell

nodes.excerpt: We are the marketplace that makes it safe to trade gaming skins and assets. We are integrated with the gaming platform Steam for validation & our product enables scam free cash transfers between gamers worldwide.
nodes.title: GamerPay - Marketplace for trading gaming skins & assets without scams
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Hire fearlessly with our total people, payroll, and payment management solution. Papaya Global supports all types of global employment (payroll, EoR, and contractors) in over 140 countries. Provides a unified solution, from onboarding to on-going management and cross-border payments.
nodes.title: Papaya Global - Automate your global payroll in 140+ countries
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: PortÃ£o 3 helps companies in LATAM with their corporate travel, expenses and payments. From a timeline that recaps the entire trip to a BI for 100% control at the end. It's easy to understand expenses, manage them and save 30% on your company's travel costs.

nodes.excerpt: Social Checkout is an out-of-the-box checkout API that enables customers to refer people they know to redeem group discounts. Merchants can set different discounts on one-time purchases or subscriptions. Customers spend less, merchants make more.
nodes.title: Social Checkout - A checkout API to tap into social sales.
nodes.author: Benyam Ephrem

nodes.excerpt: Stripe Identity lets you programmatically confirm the identity of global users so you can prevent attacks from fraudsters while minimizing friction for legitimate customers.
nodes.title: Stripe Identity - The easiest way to verify identities
nodes.author: Edwin Wee

nodes.excerpt: Use Checkout Page Digital Downloads to sell digital downloads on the internet. Create a checkout page in a few clicks, upload your files and add the checkout to your site or share a payment link. Works on any platform, no code required.
nodes.title: Checkout Page Digital Downloads - Sell digital downloads on your website & with payment links

nodes.title: ClubhousePay - Earn money in Clubhouse by selling subscriptions on clubs

nodes.excerpt: LinksUp is the fastest and simplest way to create a beautiful and engaging professional page to sell your time, events, or digital products. Get booked and paid with one page, one link. Our goal is to focus on the technical, so you focus on growing.
nodes.title: LinksUp - The only page youâ€™ll ever need to sell services online
nodes.author: Hakob

nodes.excerpt: Stripe Invoicing is a global invoicing platform built to save you time and get you paid faster. Create and send a Stripe-hosted invoice in minutesâ€”no code required. Or, use the Invoicing API to automate how you collect and reconcile payments.
nodes.title: Stripe Invoicing - Invoicing built for speed and scale
nodes.author: Edwin Wee

nodes.excerpt: Instant is a frictionless 1-click checkout for WooCommerce stores, built to increase sales for online sellers. 1st time users fill out a short form at checkout; returning users get 1-click checkout on any Instant enabled store. â€ Get startedâ€” https://getinstant.co/ âš¡ï¸

nodes.excerpt: Bolt One Click is a simple, streamlined checkout for shoppers that enables a one-click checkout anywhereâ€”no passwords, no usernames, no entering credit card numbers. The result? Shoppers convert at a 60% higher rateâ€”good for retailers and great for shoppers.
nodes.title: Bolt One Click - The simplest and fastest checkout experience for shoppers.

nodes.excerpt: Balance Checkout is the first self-serve checkout that accepts all B2B payment needs. From net term financing to invoicing to checks, your B2B customers can finally pay how they want - with just a few clicks.
nodes.title: Balance Checkout - The first B2B checkout
nodes.author: Ben Lang

nodes.excerpt: With Slash, issue joint cards that you and your friends â€œco-own.â€ Spend a fraction of what you otherwise would on subscriptions by seamlessly splitting costs with friends.
nodes.title: Slash - Shared cards to split subscriptions, spend with friends
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Smart Invoice turns invoicing on its head: - Sent at the beginning of the project instead of the end - Client pays up front - Funds remain in escrow and arenâ€™t released until work is delivered - Built on Ethereum so payments are fast, secure, and cheap
nodes.title: Smart Invoice - A new way to pay and get paid for services

nodes.excerpt: Accept payments anywhere online, no coding required. PriceBlocs helps you close more sales in any channel through our super low friction payment links. Accept Apple Pay and Google Pay in just a few clicks.

nodes.excerpt: Ubacast helps creators host, securely stream videos and get paid through: - video channel donations, - video support donations, - video pay per view. Not all creators can earn a living from Ads on YouTube. Think of Ubacast as a Patreon for video creators.
nodes.title: Ubacast - Video streaming and monetization. Patreon for video creators
nodes.author: Sebastien Peterson

nodes.excerpt: Pay with crypto everywhere VisaÂ® is accepted online in the US with Moon VisaÂ® Prepaid Cards. Purchase single-use virtual cards with Bitcoin, Litecoin, Ether, and more. Moon is private and secure, and we donâ€™t charge users any fees.
nodes.title: Moon - Pay with crypto everywhere
nodes.author: Ken Kruger

nodes.excerpt: Card Curator is an app to help young professionals maximize their earnings from everyday spending and travel for free. Get personalized recommendations to help you automatically earn 5-10% or more on all your spending.
nodes.title: Card Curator - Win credit card rewards, points, and miles game
nodes.author: daniel senyard

nodes.excerpt: Beam makes it easy to get paid to text your biggest fans. Send premium paid content, images, or videos directly to your monthly paying subscribers.
nodes.title: Beam - Get paid to delight your followers via text
nodes.author: Justin Mitchell

nodes.excerpt: B.E.P. or Backendless Ecommerce Platform turns any website into a shop with just 1-line of code, no backend or CMS required. Plus, it's free, minus standard processing fees (2.9% + $0.30, per transaction).
nodes.title: B.E.P. - Launch a shop with 1-line of code, no CMS required
nodes.author: surgieboi

nodes.excerpt: Lastbit Cards is a payment app for Europeans, featuring a MasterCard debit card that can be funded through instant Bitcoin transactions. Spend globally at online or physical stores and earn Bitcoin. Create burner cards for privacy and security.
nodes.title: Lastbit Cards - A card to spend and earn Bitcoin for Europeans
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: TillyPay is a powerful no-code payment platform, powered by Stripe. ğŸ”§ Build beautiful checkouts in seconds. ğŸ’³ Collect recurring payments in 120+ currencies. ğŸ Accept all major cards including Apple Pay. ğŸªŸ Manage all your customers under the portal.

nodes.excerpt: Corrily optimizes prices and discounts for subscription and usage-based companies. By copying a few lines of code, you can run experiments to find better prices, localize them to the user, and boost growth and retention.
nodes.title: Corrily - Price localization and optimization for SaaS companies
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Panther helps startups employ people in 160+ countries without having to set up foreign subsidiaries. We automate global compliance, payroll, taxes, and benefits, so you can build a world-class remote team without losing focus of your company's growth ğŸš€
nodes.title: Panther - Global employment for remote teams
nodes.author: DeWayne Johnson

nodes.excerpt: Per Diem makes it easy for local businesses to sell subscriptions online, and gives them all the tools they need to build their own Amazon Prime.
nodes.title: Per Diem - Subscriptions for local businesses
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Hire anyone in LATAM legally in seconds. We enable HR teams to easily manage paperwork, compliance and payments for distributed teams all over LATAM.
nodes.title: Ontop - Multi-country payroll manager for LATAM
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Valora is a P2P payment app that allows you to send money like a text message to anyone worldwide. Powered by the Celo blockchain platform, Valora is the only wallet that enables trustless mobile transactions, with an easy-to-use UX, at near-zero fees.
nodes.title: Valora - Send money like a text message to anyone worldwide
nodes.author: Naval Ravikant

nodes.excerpt: Lendtable gives employees the cash to max out their full 401(k) match and employee stock purchase plan (ESPP). Sign up in 3 minutes to start earning thousands of dollars a year from your employee benefits.
nodes.title: Lendtable - We give you the money to max out your employee benefits
nodes.author: Nathan Baschez

nodes.excerpt: Use Postal to add a paywall to your email. Make unknown senders pay a fee to reach your inbox. Put a price on your attention!
nodes.title: Postal - A paywall for your email
nodes.author: Ranjith

nodes.excerpt: PeachPay empowers creators and freelancers to convert their passion into income, and start accepting payment quickly through our simple and accelerated checkout method.
nodes.title: PeachPay - Convert your passion into income
nodes.author: Ben Lang

nodes.excerpt: Accesstype empowers publishers with the ability to move to datawalls and paywalls that increase audience loyalty and generate predictable reader revenue. Available on WordPress and Bold CMS
nodes.title: Accesstype - Monetize content with paywalls and content subscriptions
nodes.author: Susanna Varghese

nodes.excerpt: Unstack's content platform now allows you to set up one-time and subscription payments as well as launch membership sites with granular page-level access controls for users. Turn your digital content into a money-making machine using Unstack and Stripe.
nodes.title: Unstack Payments - eCommerce landing pages and membership sites
nodes.author: Grant Deken

nodes.excerpt: Craftgate, a cloud-based payment gateway, provides you safe processing through a single integration and allows you on growing your business.
nodes.title: Craftgate - Cloud-based payment gateway
nodes.author: Hakan ERDOGAN

nodes.excerpt: Sponsorware for Github is the easiest way to sell access to your private repositories on Github with Github Sponsors. Get started in minutes and start selling your software on Github today!
nodes.title: Sponsorware for Github - Sell access to Github repositories with Github Sponsors.
nodes.author: Jim Bisenius
